original_text: The group of believers put these seven men in front of the apostles. The apostles prayed for each man and they put their hands on them. They gave them authority to do this special work.
korean_text: 사도들 앞에 세우니 사도들이 기도하고 그들에게 안수하니라

sentences.original_text: The group of believers put these seven men
sentences.korean_translation: 믿는 사람들의 그룹은 이 일곱 사람을 세웠다

sentences.original_text: The apostles prayed for each man
and they put their hands on them
